name: Save Option
func:
// Save the user's selection for future use
flow.set(msg.topic, msg.payload);

Configuration Message
format:
Next, confirm the configuration options below are correct for your coach.


Some options are only relevant to specific years (e.g. thermostats) or models (e.g. undercoach lights).

name: Welcome Message
format:
Welcome to CoachProxy!


Please select your year, model, and floor plan below to begin. Note, you may need to scroll down in the menu to find your model or floor plan.

name: Save and Install Message
format:
When finished, use the "Save and Install" button below to save your changes and re-configure your CoachProxy.


Important: Your web browser may say 'Connection lost' while CoachProxy reloads. The re-configuration process will take approximately 30 seconds to complete.

name: Config HVAC Header
